Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $12000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible experience while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe in the immense value this product can bring to you and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
